dcterms:creator: L. Shi
S. Zhao
W. Zhou
Z. Chen
dcterms:description: The Win5-LID database contains 6 real scenes captured by Lytro illum and 4 synthetic scenes as original images which cover various spatial perceptual information and colorfulness. There exist 220 distorted LFIs by introducing 6 distortion types, including HEVC, JPEG, LN, NN and two CNN models.
dcterms:title: Win5-LID

dcterms:creator: V. K. Adhikarla
M. Vinkler
D. Sumin
R. K. Mantiuk
K. Myszkowski
H.-P. Seidel
P. Didyk
dcterms:description: The MPI-LFA database consists of 14 pristine LFIs captured by the TSC system, which also cover various spatial perceptual information and colorfulness. The 336 distorted LFIs are produced with 6 distortion types, i.e. HEVC, DQ, OPT, LINEAR, NN and GAUSS.
dcterms:title: MPI-LFA

dcterms:creator: P. Paudyal
F. Battisti
M. Sjöström
R. Olsson
M. Carli
dcterms:description: The SMART database is composed of 16 original LFIs and 256 distorted sequences obtained by introducing 4 compression distortions which include HEVC Intra, JPEG, JPEG2000 and SSDC.
dcterms:title: SMART

dcterms:creator: I. Viola
T. Ebrahimi
dcterms:description: The VALID database includes 5 reference LFIs and 40 distorted LFIs under 5 compression artifacts. It contains both 8bit and 10bit LFIs.
dcterms:title: VALID
